mods.abstract: TWENTY DOLLARS REWARD-- Will be paid for the delivery to me of the slave ANNE or MILDEN, who left my house on the 12th of November last. She formerly belonged to Mr. Jewell, living near St. Mary's Market. She is tall, slim, and well built, has nearly straight hair, has false teeth, is a griff or dark mulatto color, has been living in the city for the last four years. She has been harbored by a slave by the name of York, living with his master at the corner of Annunciation and Maria streets. She has been seen often early in the morning in Treme and St. Mary's Market. [dec18] F.M. FISK

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent. ([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
